title: I can play a champion i dont have that isnt on free to play
body: First time this has happened i saw jinx she was not on f2p but i could play her im still capable of purchasing her http://puu.sh/hPsza/03c9745b06.png http://puu.sh/hPsAe/836e87ee88.png

replies.body:
Since Viktor is currently disabled, and he was one of the free to play champions this week, we've added Jinx as one of the free to play champions. 

This is working as intended. :]
Good thing it was an ADC. I really don't like the implication you guys send to new players by having Urgot as one of the two "Marksmen" for the week.

same just happened to me and my friend.
                                                                        EDIT:
 
 my friend just relogged and they replaced viktor with her since hes bugged out at the moment

I WAS ABOUT TO SAY THIS

WAS IT IN CUSTOM?
